mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.business_id AS "businessId", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.name AS "name", a.product_sn AS "productSn", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.distribution_quantity AS "distributionQuantity", a.remind_quantity AS "remindQuantity", a.is_open AS "isOpen", a.product_id AS "productId", a.product_name AS "productName", a.product_second_category AS "productSecondCategory", a.first_show AS "firstShow", a.product_first_category AS "productFirstCategory", a.business_name AS "businessName", a.activity_name AS "activityName", a.is_creat AS "isCreat", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.coupon_type AS "couponType", a.receive_type AS "receiveType", a.coupon_value AS "couponValue", a.coupon_unit AS "couponUnit", a.type AS "type"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ad_coupon a WHERE type = #{type} and first_show = 1 and receive_type =0 and remind_quantity > 0 and del_flag = 1 order by id
select ab.business_id from ad_coupon ac join ad_business ab on ac.business_id = ab.id where ac.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id,b.company,b.logo FROM ad_coupon c INNER JOIN ad_business b ON c.business_id = b.id WHERE NOW() between c.begin_date AND c.end_date AND c.del_flag = 0 AND c.is_open = 1 AND c.receive_channel = 1 GROUP BY b.id

SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM ad_coupon c INNER JOIN ad_business b ON c.business_id = b.id WHERE NOW() between c.begin_date AND c.end_date AND c.del_flag = 0 AND c.is_open = 1 AND c.receive_channel = 1
AND b.id = #{businessId}

SELECT
FROM ad_coupon a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS "couponId", c.id AS "id", c.begin_date AS "beginDate", c.end_date AS "endDate", a.product_name AS "productName", a.business_name AS "businessName", a.coupon_value AS "couponValue", d.id AS "activityId", d.introduction AS "introduction", a.description AS "description", a.description AS "couponDescription", a.receive_channel AS "receiveChannel", a.business_online_url AS "businessOnlineUrl", a.coupon_category AS "couponCategory", ab.logo AS "bussinessLogo", CASE WHEN b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.activity_id = #{activityId} THEN '2' WHEN c.coupon_remind_quantity = 0 THEN '4' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(c.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(c.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '3' end AS couponStatus FROM ad_coupon a LEFT JOIN ad_coupon_code b ON a.id = b.coupon AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.activity_id = #{activityId} INNER JOIN ad_coupon_activity_conn c ON a.id = c.coupon_id INNER JOIN ad_coupon_activity d ON d.id = c.activity_id INNER JOIN ad_business ab ON a.business_id = ab.id WHERE c.begin_date >=#{startDate} AND c.begin_date <=#{endDate} AND c.activity_id = #{activityId} ORDER BY a.id ASC limit #{couponNumLimit}
